reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, luxurious, and well-made, with a nice sleeve length and true-to-size fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and soft fabric
items.body: Beautiful and very soft. The green sea grass color is just as pictured and perfect for fall. Fit is excellent and true to size. This is a great sweater to look put together with some jeans and simple jewelry. Immediately ordered a second color! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Texas Winters !!
items.body: Love this light weight sweater! I live in Texas and it is perfect for most winter days. Fits nice , lays nice. The American üá∫üá∏ Flag looks awesome Read more
items.author: Mary Beth Konovalski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great thin sweater
items.body: Thinner than I thought but so comfortable and soft. The size is true to size and so cute Read more
items.author: Sarah Avants

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars nothing like the advertisement ‚òπÔ∏è
items.body: Very soft & lightweight - so ‚Äúsweater‚Äù adjacent. Unfortunately, the negative space surrounding the üéÄ was pink as well- instead of the off white color of the top. Also I found the üéÄ placement to be too low ~ sooo NOT flattering Read more
items.author: MARY ANN RICHARDSON

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too thin for my liking.
items.body: The sweater looks very pretty in the pictures, but in person it‚Äôs much thinner than expected. It feels more like a lightweight knit than a true sweater, & the fabric is quite thin. Nearly see-through. That said, the design is attractive & it still works well for layering or milder weather. Just keep in mind it‚Äôs not the cozy, thick sweater you might be imagining. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin and clingy
items.body: Cute sweater but too thin and clung to tummy area. No one wants to see a bow on a belly. üòÇ Read more
items.author: Gesh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweater ever.
items.body: My favorite sweater ever! Soft and nice sleeve length. I have long arms and they actually fit! The cuffs are longer so you could easily cuff it and it would look nice if you have shorter arms. Please make more colors! I bought brown and it‚Äôs a nice cool brown. Waiting for black to arrive! I would buy in every color. Greta price and the fit is like a medium‚Ä¶. Not oversized but not tight everywhere. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Rachel Diede

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic!
items.body: Super soft sweater and beautiful color. Slims were a good length as well. Material was not clingy at all either. Good purchase for the value. Read more
items.author: Tina W

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1a Dark Brown, 1a Urban Grey, 1a Sky Blue, 1a Black, 1a Walnut, 1a Dark Green, 1a Zesty Pink, 1a Seagrass, 1a White, 2a White, 2a Gray, 2a Youthful Pink, 2a Fiery Red, 2a Jet Stream. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
